column1: Little Goat Diner////The patty melt had amazing crunch that only good bread can give
column2: a real tasting patty not frozen or overly seasoned to mask sub quality meat.  Th fries were good but a little thin for my liking
column3: fresh cut thicker potatoes would have sent them to the stratosphere.  The tuna melt was not your mama's tuna melt but it was the best my husband had ever tasted.
